attributes.long-description:
A death-defying thrill-ride starring Joe Danger: Master of Disaster, exclusively on the PlayStation®3 computer entertainment system! Combo, boost and pull ludicrous stunts to fill Stadiums and put Joe back on the podium.

Race against your friends or take on your rivals, the reckless Team Nasty. Leap school buses full of screaming kids, pools of ravenous sharks and enormous boxing gloves, as you attempt to wheelie your way into the record books.

Create, share and play! Drop into the sandbox to make your own Events, set new records and torment your friends with your devious creations. Take on your Rivals! Compete in Split Screen face-offs, then take on the World with your high-scoring Combos. Laugh in the face of Danger! As you crash and bounce from boulder to boulder, on fire, towards a pile of giant mousetraps. Wear the cape of the World’s Most Determined Stuntman, but can you take Joe from zero to hero as you ride through over 60 eye-poppingly gorgeous levels?

©2010 Hello Games Limited. Joe Danger, Hello Games and their respective logos are trade marks of Hello Games Limited. All Rights Reserved.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
attributes.name: Joe Danger
